dublin_core.dcvalue: Subhi Quraishi, CEO and Mobile 4 Development Director, ZMQ Development | Tel: +91-124-4368897, Email: subhi@zmq.in

Integrated mobile application that provides education tools, iconic messaging kits and mobile games geared towards maternal and child health, family planning and adolescent girls' health for low literate women.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:20:00Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 mirachannel.pdf: 270395 bytes, checksum: a6941f5e8e65d213a45cf45c5927f027 (MD5)

Mobile Integrated Resources For Aurat-Women (MIRA) Channel

data collection and reporting, Client education and behavior change communication, Electronic decision support, electronic health records, Child Health, Family planning, Maternal Health, Newborn Health, Sexual and Reproductive Health
